Name: Agalega Islands
Description: The Agalega Islands are located in the Indian Ocean, north of Mauritius. They are known for their natural beauty, with a sparse population.

Name: Rodrigues Island
Description: Rodrigues Island is an autonomous outer island of Mauritius, known for its rugged landscape, beaches, and birdlife.

Name: Flacq
Description: Flacq is located on the eastern part of Mauritius. It is known for its beautiful beaches and as a popular tourist destination.

Name: Grand Port
Description: Grand Port is located in the southeastern part of Mauritius, historically significant for its role in the island s development and its natural surroundings.

Name: Moka
Description: Moka is a central region of Mauritius, known for its agricultural landscape and proximity to the capital, Port Louis.

Name: Pamplemousses
Description: Pamplemousses is located in the northern part of Mauritius. It is home to the famous Pamplemousses Botanical Garden and various tourist attractions.

Name: Plaines Wilhems
Description: Plaines Wilhems is located in the central part of Mauritius and is the island s most populous region, with many urban developments.

Name: Port Louis
Description: Port Louis is the capital city and the main port of Mauritius, located in the west of the island. It is the country s political, economic, and cultural center.

Name: Rivière du Rempart
Description: Rivière du Rempart is a region located on the northeastern part of Mauritius. It features picturesque coastal landscapes and is known for tourism.

Name: Savanne
Description: Savanne is located in the southern part of Mauritius. It is known for its rugged terrain, beaches, and natural reserves.
